ygData.subject: Re: CAMPING
ygData.msgSnippet: I read in an interview with the designers that they were contemplating making the monk available for the lizards, only so they could do some really cool moves
ygData.messageBody:
I read in an interview with the designers that they were
contemplating making the monk available for the lizards,
only so they could do some really cool moves with the
tail. I also think that they should be of higher intelligence
and be able to become a lizard wizard :) Sort of like the
evil Palanthas lizards from Raymond E. Feists novels (I
hope that is where they were from).

> ----------
> From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:59 AM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] CAMPING
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> I think the expansion is due out before xmas, around the time of diablo 2,
> to keep all of us eqers drolling over this game and not diablo ( like THAT
> was gonna happen anyways.) They said that they would be implementing some
> new zones before the expansion as well, and with the expansion comes a
> whole
> bunch of stuff. Lizardmen race ( which i think the stats are gonna be
> something like this STR - high STA med AGI way high DEX way high INT Below
> av WIS below av CHA way low) I just hope that this new race is gonna be
> more
> than just another race of ogres and trolls, i mean if it is then thats
> boring, 3 races and each of them can only pkc 3 classes....BORING. I think
> the class break down of the new race will be something like
> this..........1.Warrior 2. Rogue 3. Shaman 4. Shadow Knight Now of course
> i
> could be way wrong about the stats and they might be a really smart bunch
> of
> reptiles and they may be the evil version of the high elfs or something (
> Uh
> huh yeah right, who ever heard of a smart lizard....=) ) But regardless
> its
> gonna be cool to have a continent where the only race is an evil
> race....thatll make it good for us Dark Elves to go exploring and not
> worry
> about getting KOS.
>
> What do you guys think about the prospect of a new race? Think they'll be
> smart? like the Dark elves? Or big and powerfull like the Trolls and
> ogres...or more of an evil Halfing style, quick and agile...like i think..
>
> Lemme know what ya think.
> John Zwanenburg
> Tips Support/Support Sipt
> Tel: (613) 998-2745

> > maybe. Anyway, that's good news.
> >
> > -Faderic
